hotspot_1:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show" id="tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/336x345/" class="mb-3img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Validation & Testing</h2><p class="txt">Today's vehicles are becoming more sophisticated, with onboard computers, electrical power and complex architecture. Every aspect of a vehicle must be thoroughly tested and validated before production - meaning engineers need devices that can work in tandem with complex systems.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Testing doesn't just put a demand on the vehicles - it can also put strain on the devices used to perform checks, scanning and calibration. From extreme weather testing to the bumps, knocks and drops in the test lab, devices must be able to support engineers with smooth, precise software that can interface with complicated instruments and stand up to the rugged environment.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac's rugged devices are perfectly suited to the test lab and have been used to support multiple projects in R&D.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Extreme Weather Ready – Getac devices are certified to perform in rain, dust, shock, vibration and withstand both extreme high and low temperatures.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Specialized Ports – Our devices are equipped with ports that support a wide range of calibration, measurement and industry specific tools.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Secure – Protect your sensitive data with biometric security and complete control of your devices.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Versatile – Rugged hardware works in conjunction with manufacturer engineering software to perform scanning, cataloguing and ECU programming uninterrupted.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">The test lab is a critical part of a vehicle's journey from concept to production. It's a place you need rugged devices you can put your full trust in, that's why we've built our range of devices to perform in R&D.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Cable-Free Connectivity – Connect directly to the vehicle, VCI and R&D infrastructure via fast dual WLAN and Bluetooth.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Global Certification and Support – Our devices are in use by major OEMs, are certified for use globally and backed by our world-class support and services.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Optimized Screen Sizes – No matter your needs, our wide range of devices have large screen sizes to support tasks such as Test Data, Thermal Battery Testing and 3D prototyping.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Flexible Connectivity – Our configurable port options work with the industry's leading testing and measurement devices.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab3-content"><div hotspot_2:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show" id="tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/336x345/" class="mb-3img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Extreme Conditions & Environmental Testing</h2><p class="txt">Modern vehicles have to stand up to extreme conditions - whether that's the rigours of a frozen road or a hot, humid sub-continental environment. To thoroughly test these conditions, you need a device that can stand up to the same challenges.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Not all devices are able to survive in harsh conditions - whether they're simply not built-rugged from the start or have to be put in a case to prevent damage. High-humidity, low temperatures, searing heat - each has its challenges, not to mention risk of drops, knocks or damage in the laboratory.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac is the device of choice for several OEM's to take out into the field, connect with measurement devices and perform as a data acquisition device. They are designed to work in harsh and extreme ambient temperatures, endure high levels of vibration - ensuring there is no costly disruption, device replacement or a need to repeat the test.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Our compact, rugged-devices have a number of features that make them perfectly suited to any environment:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Built-rugged construction permeates every level of our devices.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Fast, powerful processors enable rapid working and calculation for the most precise data.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> High ease-of-use and device familiarity ensures seamlessly operability by all members of your team.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> A range of configurations and accessories means our devices can be modulated to suit any task or environment.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content"
